item.title: How to make an item give exp detailed
item.dc:creator: @climatikk climatikk
item.description:
@climatikk wrote:

Src>com>rs>net>decoders>Handlers

inventoryoptionshandler.java

Search for - public static void handleItemOption1(Player player, final int slotId,
now you should see something similar to this
if (Burying.bury(player, slotId)) return;
under this add for example

		if (itemId == The ID of item here) {
			player.getSkills().addXp(The skill that you want exp in here for example 1, The amount of exp you want to give);
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(The item Id you put above, 1);
			return;
		}

Read full topic
